# The `IRSimilarityIdentifier` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This class puts all the pieces of the <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/irsimilarity/irinstructiondata">IRInstructionData</a>, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/irsimilarity/irinstructionmapper">IRInstructionMapper</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irsimilarity/irsimilaritycandidate">IRSimilarityCandidate</a> together. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

## Description {#details}

This class puts all the pieces of the <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/irsimilarity/irinstructiondata">IRInstructionData</a>, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/irsimilarity/irinstructionmapper">IRInstructionMapper</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irsimilarity/irsimilaritycandidate">IRSimilarityCandidate</a> together.

It first feeds the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/module">Module</a> or vector of Modules into the <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/irsimilarity/irinstructionmapper">IRInstructionMapper</a>, and puts all the mapped instructions into a single long list of <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/irsimilarity/irinstructiondata">IRInstructionData</a>.

The list of unsigned integers is given to the Suffix Tree or similar data structure to find repeated subsequences. We construct an <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irsimilarity/irsimilaritycandidate">IRSimilarityCandidate</a> for each instance of the subsequence. We compare them against one another since These repeated subsequences can have different structure. For each different kind of structure found, we create a similarity group.

If we had four IRSimilarityCandidates A, B, C, and D where A, B and D are structurally similar to one another, while C is different we would have two SimilarityGroups:

<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/irsimilarity/#a2198f86ce16da838bdeea4de7e59ef31">SimilarityGroup</a> 1: <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/irsimilarity/#a2198f86ce16da838bdeea4de7e59ef31">SimilarityGroup</a> 2 A, B, D C

A list of the different similarity groups is then returned after analyzing the module.

Definition at line 1044 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/irsimilarityidentifier-h">IRSimilarityIdentifier.h</a>.
